name: Medical Containers
description: Containers made from plastic for storing medications, specimens, and medical supplies.

name: Plastic Tubes
description: Tubes made from medical-grade plastic for various applications such as sample collection, catheterization, and infusion.

name: Plastic Syringes
description: Disposable syringes made from plastic for administering medications, vaccines, and other medical fluids.

name: Plastic Specimen Jars
description: Jars made from durable plastic for collecting and storing biological specimens in medical laboratories.

name: Plastic Pill Organizers
description: Organizers made from plastic for sorting and storing daily medications and supplements.

name: Plastic Bedpans
description: Bedpans made from lightweight plastic for patient use in hospitals and healthcare facilities.

name: Plastic Pill Crusher
description: Device made from plastic for crushing pills into a fine powder for easier administration to patients.

name: Plastic Pill Dispensers
description: Dispensers made from plastic for organizing and dispensing medications according to dosage schedules.

name: Plastic Medical Carts
description: Mobile carts made from durable plastic for transporting medical supplies, equipment, and medications within healthcare facilities.

name: Plastic Medical Waste Bins
description: Bins made from leak-proof plastic for the safe disposal of medical waste, including sharps and biohazardous materials.

name: Plastic Urinals
description: Urinals made from plastic for patient use in hospitals and healthcare facilities, particularly for bedridden or immobilized patients.

name: Plastic Medical Aprons
description: Disposable aprons made from plastic for protecting healthcare workers and patients from contamination during medical procedures.

name: Plastic IV Bags
description: Bags made from flexible plastic for intravenous fluid administration in hospitals and clinical settings.

name: Plastic Medical Gloves
description: Disposable gloves made from plastic for medical examinations, procedures, and general hygiene practices.

name: Plastic Medical Face Shields
description: Face shields made from transparent plastic for protecting healthcare workers from splashes, sprays, and respiratory droplets during medical procedures.

name: Plastic Medical Splints
description: Splints made from lightweight plastic for immobilizing and supporting injured limbs during medical treatment.

name: Plastic Medical Tubing
description: Flexible tubes made from medical-grade plastic for various medical applications such as drainage, ventilation, and fluid administration.

name: Plastic Medical Trays
description: Trays made from durable plastic for organizing and carrying medical instruments, supplies, and sterile dressings during procedures and examinations.

name: Plastic Medical Catheters
description: Catheters made from medical-grade plastic for drainage, fluid delivery, and diagnostic procedures in medical settings.

name: Plastic Medical Splitters
description: Splitters made from plastic for dividing medical gases or fluids into multiple channels or circuits for distribution to patients.

name: Plastic Medical Clamps
description: Clamps made from plastic for controlling or restricting the flow of fluids or gases in medical tubing or catheters.
